mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.role_zh_name as roleZhName ,a.role_en_name as roleEnName ,a.direction as direction ,a.yiji_menu_name as yijiMenuName ,a.yiji_menu_icon as yijiMenuIcon ,a.erji_menu as erjiMenu ,a.beizhu as beizhu ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.update_time as updateTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM menu a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.role_zh_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.roleZhName},'%')
and a.role_en_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.roleEnName},'%')
and a.direction like CONCAT('%',#{params.direction},'%')
and a.yiji_menu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yijiMenuName},'%')
and a.yiji_menu_icon like CONCAT('%',#{params.yijiMenuIcon},'%')
and a.erji_menu like CONCAT('%',#{params.erjiMenu},'%')
and a.beizhu like CONCAT('%',#{params.beizhu},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.insert_time = #{params.insertTime}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeEnd})
and a.update_time = #{params.updateTime}
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
